RelicText: Whenever you damage yourself, deal 2 damage.
Whenever you discard a card, deal 1 damage.
Whenever you draw a card, deal 2 damage.
Whenever you discard a card, deal 4 damage.
Whenever you draw a card, deal 8 damage.
All players take 50% less damage from monsters.
All players with armor do not take damage from monsters.
When your statuses expire, return it to your hand.
Whenever a player takes damage, they restore 6 health.
